27  package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
28  
29  import java.util.Date;
30  import java.util.Random;
31  
32  import org.apache.http.HttpRequest;
33  import org.apache.http.HttpResponse;
34  import org.apache.http.HttpStatus;
35  import org.apache.http.HttpVersion;
36  import org.apache.http.ProtocolVersion;
37  import static org.apache.http.impl.cookie.DateUtils.formatDate;
38  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpRequest;
39  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpResponse;
40  import org.apache.http.message.BasicStatusLine;
41  import org.junit.Assert;
42  import org.junit.Before;
43  import org.junit.Test;
44  
45  public class TestResponseCachingPolicy {
46  
47      private static final ProtocolVersion HTTP_1_1 = new ProtocolVersion("HTTP", 1, 1);
48      private ResponseCachingPolicy policy;
49      private HttpResponse response;
50      private HttpRequest request;
51      private int[] acceptableCodes = new int[] { HttpStatus.SC_OK,
52              HttpStatus.SC_NON_AUTHORITATIVE_INFORMATION, HttpStatus.SC_MULTIPLE_CHOICES,
53              HttpStatus.SC_MOVED_PERMANENTLY, HttpStatus.SC_GONE };
54      private Date now;
55      private Date tenSecondsFromNow;
56      private Date sixSecondsAgo;
57  
58      @Before
59      public void setUp() throws Exception {
60          now = new Date();
61          sixSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 6 * 1000L);
62          tenSecondsFromNow = new Date(now.getTime() + 10 * 1000L);
63  
64          policy = new ResponseCachingPolicy(0, true);
65          request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
66          response = new BasicHttpResponse(
67                  new BasicStatusLine(HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_OK, ""));
68          response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(new Date()));
69          response.setHeader("Content-Length", "0");
70      }
71  
72      @Test
73      public void testIsGetCacheable() {
74          Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
75      }
76  
77      @Test
78      public void testResponsesToRequestsWithAuthorizationHeadersAreNotCacheableBySharedCache() {
79          request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
80          request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
81          Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
82      }
83  
84      @Test
85      public void testResponsesToRequestsWithAuthorizationHeadersAreCacheableByNonSharedCache() {
86          policy = new ResponseCachingPolicy(0, false);
87          request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
88          request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
89          Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
90      }
91  
92      @Test
93      public void testAuthorizedResponsesWithSMaxAgeAreCacheable() {
94          request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
95          request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
96          response.setHeader("Cache-Control","s-maxage=3600");
97          Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
98      }
99  
100     @Test
101     public void testAuthorizedResponsesWithMustRevalidateAreCacheable() {
102         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
103         request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
104         response.setHeader("Cache-Control","must-revalidate");
105         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
106     }
107 
108     @Test
109     public void testAuthorizedResponsesWithCacheControlPublicAreCacheable() {
110         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
111         request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
112         response.setHeader("Cache-Control","public");
113         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
114     }
115 
116     @Test
117     public void testAuthorizedResponsesWithCacheControlMaxAgeAreNotCacheable() {
118         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET","/",HTTP_1_1);
119         request.setHeader("Authorization","Basic dXNlcjpwYXNzd2Q=");
120         response.setHeader("Cache-Control","max-age=3600");
121         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
122     }
123 
124     @Test
125     public void test203ResponseCodeIsCacheable() {
126         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_NON_AUTHORITATIVE_INFORMATION);
127         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
128     }
129 
130     @Test
131     public void test206ResponseCodeIsNotCacheable() {
132         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_PARTIAL_CONTENT);
133         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
134     }
135 
136     @Test
137     public void test300ResponseCodeIsCacheable() {
138         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_MULTIPLE_CHOICES);
139         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
140     }
141 
142     @Test
143     public void test301ResponseCodeIsCacheable() {
144         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_MOVED_PERMANENTLY);
145         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
146     }
147 
148     @Test
149     public void test410ResponseCodeIsCacheable() {
150         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_GONE);
151         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
152     }
153 
154     @Test
155     public void testPlain302ResponseCodeIsNotCacheable() {
156         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_MOVED_TEMPORARILY);
157         response.removeHeaders("Expires");
158         response.removeHeaders("Cache-Control");
159         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
160     }
161 
162     @Test
163     public void testPlain307ResponseCodeIsNotCacheable() {
164         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_TEMPORARY_REDIRECT);
165         response.removeHeaders("Expires");
166         response.removeHeaders("Cache-Control");
167         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
168     }
169 
170     @Test
171     public void testNon206WithExplicitExpiresIsCacheable() {
172         int status = getRandomStatus();
173         response.setStatusCode(status);
174         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(new Date()));
175         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
176     }
177 
178     @Test
179     public void testNon206WithMaxAgeIsCacheable() {
180         int status = getRandomStatus();
181         response.setStatusCode(status);
182         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "max-age=0");
183         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
184     }
185 
186     @Test
187     public void testNon206WithSMaxAgeIsCacheable() {
188         int status = getRandomStatus();
189         response.setStatusCode(status);
190         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "s-maxage=0");
191         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
192     }
193 
194     @Test
195     public void testNon206WithMustRevalidateIsCacheable() {
196         int status = getRandomStatus();
197         response.setStatusCode(status);
198         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "must-revalidate");
199         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
200     }
201 
202     @Test
203     public void testNon206WithProxyRevalidateIsCacheable() {
204         int status = getRandomStatus();
205         response.setStatusCode(status);
206         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "proxy-revalidate");
207         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
208     }
209 
210     @Test
211     public void testNon206WithPublicCacheControlIsCacheable() {
212         int status = getRandomStatus();
213         response.setStatusCode(status);
214         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "public");
215         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
216     }
217 
218     @Test
219     public void testNon206WithPrivateCacheControlIsNotCacheableBySharedCache() {
220         int status = getRandomStatus();
221         response.setStatusCode(status);
222         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "private");
223         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
224     }
225 
226     @Test
227     public void test200ResponseWithPrivateCacheControlIsCacheableByNonSharedCache() {
228         policy = new ResponseCachingPolicy(0, false);
229         response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_OK);
230         response.setHeader("Cache-Control", "private");
231         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
232     }
233 
234     @Test
235     public void testIsGetWithNoCacheCacheable() {
236         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "no-cache");
237 
238         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
239     }
240 
241     @Test
242     public void testIsGetWithNoStoreCacheable() {
243         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "no-store");
244 
245         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
246     }
247 
248     @Test
249     public void testIsGetWithNoStoreEmbeddedInListCacheable() {
250         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "public, no-store");
251 
252         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
253     }
254 
255     @Test
256     public void testIsGetWithNoCacheEmbeddedInListCacheable() {
257         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "public, no-cache");
258 
259         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
260     }
261 
262     @Test
263     public void testIsGetWithNoCacheEmbeddedInListAfterFirstHeaderCacheable() {
264         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "max-age=20");
265         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "public, no-cache");
266 
267         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
268     }
269 
270     @Test
271     public void testIsGetWithNoStoreEmbeddedInListAfterFirstHeaderCacheable() {
272         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "max-age=20");
273         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "public, no-store");
274 
275         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
276     }
277 
278     @Test
279     public void testIsGetWithAnyCacheControlCacheable() {
280         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "max=10");
281 
282         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
283 
284         response = new BasicHttpResponse(
285                 new BasicStatusLine(HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_OK, ""));
286         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(new Date()));
287         response.addHeader("Cache-Control", "no-transform");
288         response.setHeader("Content-Length", "0");
289 
290         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
291     }
292 
293     @Test
294     public void testIsGetWithout200Cacheable() {
295         HttpResponse response = new BasicHttpResponse(new BasicStatusLine(HTTP_1_1,
296                 HttpStatus.SC_NOT_FOUND, ""));
297 
298         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
299 
300         response = new BasicHttpResponse(new BasicStatusLine(HTTP_1_1,
301                 HttpStatus.SC_GATEWAY_TIMEOUT, ""));
302 
303         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
304     }
305 
306     @Test
307     public void testVaryStarIsNotCacheable() {
308         response.setHeader("Vary", "*");
309         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
310     }
311 
312     @Test
313     public void testIsGetWithVaryHeaderCacheable() {
314         response.addHeader("Vary", "Accept-Encoding");
315         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
316     }
317 
318     @Test
319     public void testIsArbitraryMethodCacheable() {
320 
321         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("PUT", response));
322 
323         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("get", response));
324     }
325 
326     @Test
327     public void testResponsesToRequestsWithNoStoreAreNotCacheable() {
328         request.setHeader("Cache-Control","no-store");
329         response.setHeader("Cache-Control","public");
330         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request,response));
331     }
332 
333     @Test
334     public void testResponsesWithMultipleAgeHeadersAreNotCacheable() {
335         response.addHeader("Age", "3");
336         response.addHeader("Age", "5");
337         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
338     }
339 
340     @Test
341     public void testResponsesWithMultipleDateHeadersAreNotCacheable() {
342         response.addHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
343         response.addHeader("Date", formatDate(sixSecondsAgo));
344         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
345     }
346 
347     @Test
348     public void testResponsesWithMalformedDateHeadersAreNotCacheable() {
349         response.addHeader("Date", "garbage");
350         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
351     }
352 
353     @Test
354     public void testResponsesWithMultipleExpiresHeadersAreNotCacheable() {
355         Date now = new Date();
356         Date sixSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 6 * 1000L);
357         response.addHeader("Expires", formatDate(now));
358         response.addHeader("Expires", formatDate(sixSecondsAgo));
359         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
360     }
361 
362     @Test
363     public void testResponsesWithoutDateHeadersAreNotCacheable() {
364         response.removeHeaders("Date");
365         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
366     }
367 
368     @Test
369     public void testResponseThatHasTooMuchContentIsNotCacheable() {
370         response.setHeader("Content-Length", "9000");
371         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
372     }
373 
374     @Test
375     public void testResponsesThatAreSmallEnoughAreCacheable() {
376         response.setHeader("Content-Length", "0");
377         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable("GET", response));
378     }
379 
380     @Test
381     public void testResponsesToGETWithQueryParamsButNoExplicitCachingAreNotCacheable() {
382         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
383         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
384     }
385 
386     @Test
387     public void testResponsesToGETWithQueryParamsAndExplicitCachingAreCacheable() {
388         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
389         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
390         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow));
391         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
392     }
393 
394     @Test
395     public void getsWithQueryParametersDirectlyFrom1_0OriginsAreNotCacheable() {
396         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
397         response = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_0, HttpStatus.SC_OK, "OK");
398         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
399     }
400 
401     @Test
402     public void getsWithQueryParametersDirectlyFrom1_0OriginsAreNotCacheableEvenWithExpires() {
403         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
404         response = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_0, HttpStatus.SC_OK, "OK");
405         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
406         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow));
407         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
408     }
409 
410     @Test
411     public void getsWithQueryParametersFrom1_0OriginsViaProxiesAreNotCacheable() {
412         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
413         response.setHeader("Via", "1.0 someproxy");
414         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
415     }
416 
417     @Test
418     public void getsWithQueryParametersFrom1_0OriginsViaProxiesAreNotCacheableEvenWithExpires() {
419         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
420         Date now = new Date();
421         Date tenSecondsFromNow = new Date(now.getTime() + 10 * 1000L);
422         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
423         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow));
424         response.setHeader("Via", "1.0 someproxy");
425         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
426     }
427 
428     @Test
429     public void getsWithQueryParametersFrom1_0OriginsViaExplicitProxiesAreNotCacheableEvenWithExpires() {
430         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
431         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
432         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow));
433         response.setHeader("Via", "HTTP/1.0 someproxy");
434         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
435     }
436 
437     @Test
438     public void getsWithQueryParametersFrom1_1OriginsVia1_0ProxiesAreCacheableWithExpires() {
439         request = new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/foo?s=bar");
440         response = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_0, HttpStatus.SC_OK, "OK");
441         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
442         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow));
443         response.setHeader("Via", "1.1 someproxy");
444         Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
445     }
446 
447     @Test
448     public void notCacheableIfExpiresEqualsDateAndNoCacheControl() {
449         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
450         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(now));
451         response.removeHeaders("Cache-Control");
452         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
453     }
454 
455     @Test
456     public void notCacheableIfExpiresPrecedesDateAndNoCacheControl() {
457         response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
458         response.setHeader("Expires", formatDate(sixSecondsAgo));
459         response.removeHeaders("Cache-Control");
460         Assert.assertFalse(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
461     }
462     
463     @Test
464     public void otherStatusCodesAreCacheableWithExplicitCachingHeaders() {
465     	response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_NOT_FOUND);
466     	response.setHeader("Date", formatDate(now));
467     	response.setHeader("Cache-Control","max-age=300");
468     	Assert.assertTrue(policy.isResponseCacheable(request, response));
469     }
470 
471     private int getRandomStatus() {
472         int rnd = (new Random()).nextInt(acceptableCodes.length);
473 
474         return acceptableCodes[rnd];
475     }
476 }
